description: Try our easy to follow Speedy Apple Crumble-style Desserts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Speedy Apple Crumble-style Desserts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large Bramley cooking apples, peeled, cored and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a heavy-based frying pan and cook the apple chunks over a medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 5-6 minutes until tender and browned.
Add the sugar and cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Add the cream and cook, stirring, for a further 1 minute until the sauce is caramel coloured and the apples are tender yet still retaining their shape.
Divide the apple mixture between 4 warmed serving bowls. Mix the oat cereal with the almonds and spoon over the top of the hot apple mixture. Serve with a spoonful of clotted cream on top, if liked.
